import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Navbar from '../Nav'; import axios, { Axios } from 'axios'; function User() { const url ="http://172.22.81.182:8080/rfid/generatelabelpdf" const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ Username: '', origin_data: '', destination_data: '', dimensions: '', sender_data: '', receiver_data: '', sender_phone: '', receiver_phone: '', product_details: '', }); function submit(e){ e.preventDefault(); Axios.post(url,{ origin_data:formData.origin_data, destination_data: formData.destination_data, dimensions: formData.dimensions, sender_data: formData.sender_data, receiver_data: formData.receiver_data, sender_phone: formData.sender_phone, receiver_phone: formData.receiver_phone, product_details: formData.receiver_phone, }) .then(res=>{ console.log(res.formData) }) } function handle(e){ const newdata={...formData} newdata[e.target.id]=e.target.value setFormData(newdata) console.log(newdata) } return (
submit(e)} className='flex justify-center items-center flex-col' >

Enter user name

handle(e)} /> handle(e)} /> handle(e)} /> handle(e)} /> handle(e)} /> handle(e)} /> handle(e)} /> handle(e)} />
); } export default User;
